query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(training_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS filings_count, lobbyist WHERE training_date >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, lobbyist ORDER BY month, lobbyist

column_metadata.name: training_date
column_metadata.description: Date/Time the lobbyist submitted the Certificate of Lobbyist Training form to the Ethics Commission.

column_metadata.name: lobbyist
column_metadata.description: Name of the registered lobbyist that completed the Certificate of Lobbyist Training Form.

table_metadata.title: Certificate of Lobbyist Training Filings
table_metadata.description: Represents the date and time a lobbyist filed the Certificate of Lobbyist Training form. Includes data from January 1, 2018.

title: Certificate of Lobbyist Training Filings
